mapper.sql: select id, assess_order_id, status, status_cn, log_msg, create_time, create_person, user_mobile, user_name from car_assess_order_log
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM car_assess_order_log WHERE create_person=#{userId} and status !='1'

SELECT t2.create_user_name user_name, t2.name auto_info_name, t2.car_photo mian_photo, t1.create_time, t1.id assess_order_id FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id = t2.id WHERE t1.status = '1' and t1.store_id = #{storeId}
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t2.create_user, t3.auto_info_name, t3.main_photo, t4.create_time FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id=t2.id INNER JOIN car_auto t3 ON t2.auto_id=t3.id INNER JOIN car_assess_order_log t4 ON t1.id=t4.assess_order_id WHERE t4.create_person=#{userId} and t4.status !='1'
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
